ygData.subject: Re: Zimel's Blades
ygData.msgSnippet: He only spawns at certain times of day and not long then.  When he does spawn you have to act fast before he leaves.   I ve had my best luck around 6-7 in the
ygData.messageBody:
He only spawns at certain times of day and not long then. When he does
spawn you have to act fast before he leaves. I've had my best luck around
6-7 in the morning. If he hasn't spawned by about 8:00 I find something
else to do until the next morning. I've gotten four blankets from him of
which 3 were before the solution was posted for the world to see.

>From: Avron <avron@...>
>Reply-To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqpaladin] Zimel's Blades
>Date: Fri, 16 Jul 1999 16:25:00 +0200
>
>From: Avron <avron@...>
>
>
>I am in the part of the quest where I am supposed to meet Tykar Renlin
>in the Seafarers Roost inn, but I have searched it thouroughly and he
>was not there, does he only come at a certain time or do I need to do
>something to make him come?
>Also my faction with the innkeepers is so that I cannot trade with them,
>I am KOS by freeport militia aswell, and this has REALLY made the quest
>hard to do, I don't even want to think about how I am supposed to get
>into the dungeon and meet Zimel hehe. But I guess this is all easy
>compared to the other two pieces of the quest heh..
>
>- Avron Elselynn - Solusek Ro
>
